data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Restelo have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Sporting with the kick-off.
In the minute 1, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting.
Afonso Sousa (Belenenses) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Rui Costa signals a Sporting throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Belenenses have a dangerous throw-in.
Tiago Tomas is on target to give Sporting a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 5, Great play from Bruno Tabata to set up the goal.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Sporting.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 7, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Belenenses.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 10, Free kick Sporting.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 12, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Belenenses go level at 1-1 through Miguel Cardoso in Lisbon.
In the minute 14, That's a fine assist from Tiago Esgaio.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Sporting.
Belenenses have been awarded a penalty in Lisbon...
In the minute 16, Sporting's Antonio Adan has been booked in Lisbon.
Rui Costa awards Belenenses a penalty but Miguel Cardoso misses from 12 yards.
In the minute 19, Sporting needs to be cautious. Belenenses have an attacking throw-in.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Belenenses's Silvestre Varela is whistled for offside at Estadio do Restelo.
Penalty! Rui Costa points to the spot, great chance for Sporting...
Tiago Esgaio (Belenenses) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 24, Joao Mario smashes in a penalty at Estadio do Restelo. The score is now 1-2.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Pedro Porro for Sporting drives towards goal at Estadio do Restelo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Sporting.
Belenenses push forward at Estadio do Restelo and Silvestre Varela gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sporting defence.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Lisbon Belenenses drive forward through Afonso Sousa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Belenenses capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
Rui Costa awards Sporting a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
Miguel Cardoso for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Sporting at Estadio do Restelo.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Sporting to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Sporting have a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 38, Sporting's Tiago Tomas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Belenenses defender.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Belenenses.
Miguel Cardoso of Belenenses smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nuno Mendes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sporting.
In the minute 41, Sporting have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Diogo Calila of Belenenses gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, Rui Costa awards Sporting a goal kick.
Sporting have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Belenenses.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 45, Miguel Cardoso for Belenenses has been booked by Rui Costa and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, Rui Costa blows to start the second-half. Belenenses with the kick-off.
Belenenses's Silvestre Varela gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Restelo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
In the minute 47, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a Sporting throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Free kick Sporting.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio do Restelo.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 56, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Belenenses drives forward and Afonso Sousa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, The match at Estadio do Restelo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Diogo Calila, who is down injured.
Belenensesâ€™s Diogo Calila is on his feet again at Estadio do Restelo.
Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Free kick Sporting.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Rui Costa awards Belenenses a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Belenenses's area.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
At Estadio do Restelo, Goncalo Inacio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 64, Sporting to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Sporting's Pedro Porro misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Throw-in high up the field for Belenenses in Lisbon.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 68, Nuno Santos is replacing Pedro Goncalves for the away team.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 72, Petit is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Restelo with Francisco Teixeira replacing Silvestre Varela.
Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 74, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Tomas Ribeiro (Belenenses) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Belenenses.
Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Belenenses, close to Sporting's area.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Belenenses's Tomas Ribeiro has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Vitorino Antunes is on a sub for Nuno Mendes for Sporting.
Sporting make their third substitution with Matheus Nunes replacing Joao Palhinha.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 80, Belenenses are pushing forward but Danny Henriques's finish is wide of the goal.
Sporting have a goal kick.
The home team replace Afonso Sousa with Edi Semedo.
The home team have replaced Sphephelo Sithole with Bruno Ramires. This is the third substitution made today by Petit.
Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Luis Neto (Sporting) gets a yellow card.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 84, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andraz Sporar is replacing Tiago Tomas for the away team.
In Lisbon Belenenses's Edi Semedo is caught offside.
The home team replace Afonso Taira with Caue.
In the minute 87, Mateo Cassierra is on a sub for Miguel Cardoso for Belenenses.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Can Belenenses capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sporting's half?
Rui Costa signals a Belenenses throw-in in Sporting's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Belenenses needs to be cautious. Sporting have an attacking throw-in.
Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Rui Costa blows against Sporting's Andraz Sporar for offside.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rui Costa blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
